name: Match the Card
description:
Title: Match the Card

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E Target 

Market: All ages

Game Overview: The objective is to flip cards until 2 of the same gets matched

Instructions: Click on cards to see what fruits is hidden beneath, then match up the same ones!
